      • deduplicate

        public TransformableRDD deduplicate(java.util.List<java.lang.Integer> primaryColumnIndexes)
        Returns a new TransformableRDD containing only unique records by considering the given the columns as the primary key.
        Parameters:
        primaryColumnIndexes - A list of integers specifying the columns that will be combined to create the primary key.
        Returns:
        TransformableRDD A new TransformableRDD consisting records by eliminating all duplicates depending upon the primary key.
